event.description: {CovLStrv2{Spring Security framework uses weak hashing algorithm in the PasswordEncoder interface. Weak hashing algorithm does not adequately protect the password. In case of a data leak from a password storage, attackers will easily be able to obtain the original password values.}}

{CovLStrv2{Audit the use of password encoder with the weak password hashing algorithm. Instead, use a stronger password encoder in production such as `org.springframework.security.crypto.bcrypt.BCryptPasswordEncoder`.}}
